verses.verse: And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon thy <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto thee.

And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into me when he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto me, and <S%H5975>set<s%> me upon my <S%H7272>feet<s%>, that I <S%H8085>heard<s%> him that <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto me.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, I <S%H7971>send<s%> thee to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to a <S%H4775>rebellious<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> that hath <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against me: they and their <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me, even unto this <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

For they are <S%H7186%H6440>impudent<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> and <S%H2389%H3820>stiffhearted<s%>. I do <S%H7971>send<s%> thee unto them; and thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

And they, whether they will <S%H8085>hear<s%>, or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear<s%>, (for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>,) yet shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that there hath been a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

¶ And thou, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them, neither be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of their <S%H1697>words<s%>, though <S%H5621>briers<s%> and <S%H5544>thorns<s%> be with thee, and thou dost <S%H3427>dwell<s%> among <S%H6137>scorpions<s%>: be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of their <S%H1697>words<s%>, nor be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H6440>looks<s%>, though they be a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> unto them, whether they will <S%H8085>hear<s%>, or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear<s%>: for they are most <S%H4805>rebellious<s%>.

But thou, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> what I <S%H1696>say<s%> unto thee; Be <S%H1961>not<s%> thou <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> like that <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>: <S%H6475>open<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> that I <S%H5414>give<s%> thee.
¶ And when I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, behold, an <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto me; and, lo, a <S%H4039>roll<s%> of a <S%H5612>book<s%> was therein;

And he <S%H6566>spread<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> me; and it was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6440>within<s%> and <S%H268>without<s%>: and there was <S%H3789>written<s%> therein <S%H7015>lamentations<s%>, and <S%H1899>mourning<s%>, and <S%H1958>woe<s%>.
